name: Pumpking Tower Defense
description:
It's the night before Halloween, and monsters are attacking your home hoping to eat the candy you left out for Trick or Treaters! Defend your candy from a thirty wave onslaught with your collection of living Jack O' Lanterns in this Halloween-themed Tower Defense Game.

Watch how the game was made in my weekly devlog series on my Rumble channel - https://rumble.com/c/FreeComet

Controls:

Left click to use buttons, WASD to pan camera. Q and E to zoom in and out if the mouse wheel doesn't work. Alt + F4 to quit game
